topComments.comment: this ride is really fun and the waits are really short (always under 20mins) some rides hurt my thighs but rows 10-11 didn‚Äôt really hurt when i rode. the airtime on this ride is good but the ride is getting old and rough. still a favorite!

topComments.author: Maz Syd
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Talvez outros tenham tido experi√™ncias melhores, no entanto, sentamos no primeiro carrinho (segunda fila) n√£o recomendaria isso para ningu√©m com problemas nas costas, problemas no pesco√ßo, pois n√£o tenho nenhum e isso foi INTENSO. (Original) Maybe others have had better experiences however we sat in the first cart (second row) would not recommend this to anyone with back issues, neck issues as I have none and this was INTENSE. I would recommend for using as a torture technique, one ride on this and they'll be spilling their deepest secrets lol. This was painful, they use a seat belt and a bar to hold you in but with the amount of speed and 'jerk' force throughout the ride made me nauseous for the rest of the day and  have a headache and neck pain for two days. Please cedar point switch this ride out, it's 33 years old or needs a major upgrade!!

topComments.author: Matt Karls
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Magnum Xcel 200 em Cedar Point em Sandusky Ohio √© incr√≠vel! Eu montei o assento m√°gico no banco da frente e no banco de tr√°s Eu posso te dizer se voc√™ quer algum ejetor louco pops de tempo de antena no carro uma fileira tr√™s √© o banco m√°gico e √© uma loucura! Meu ponto favorito √© provavelmente a √∫ltima linha, embora como eu gosto do tempo de antena flutuante voc√™ volta l√° e √© um pouco menos dif√≠cil ser puxado sobre os elementos da parte traseira do trem. Se voc√™ est√° procurando um √≥timo momento, definitivamente precisa dar uma olhada na Magnum XL 200 em Cedar Point  (Original) Magnum Xcel 200 at Cedar point in Sandusky Ohio is amazing! I rode the magic seat the front seat and the back seat I can tell you if you want some crazy ejector airtime pops ride in car one row three it's the magic seat and it's nuts! My favorite spot is probably the very back row though as I like the floater airtime you get back there and it's just a little less rough being pulled over the elements from the rear of the train. If you're looking for a great time you definitely have to check out Magnum XL 200 at Cedar Point

topComments.author: John V
topComments.comment: A bit bumby but fun!  I feel this would be a great location for a future 500 ft coaster ;)

(Original) Great ride for the historical value of being the first hyper coaster, but man is it jerky and the bunny hills at the end are painful in my opinion. Great views though, and it's always practically a walk on, which might be saying something in a park with consistently long lines.
